intro: Fight, dodge, and blast your way through enemies!
description:
This 2.5D action platformer throws you into shiny armor with a very big blaster — and lets you move exactly how you want. Double-jump, air-dash, weave through hazards, smash through destructible stages, and chase a higher score with every run. Tough at first, fair at heart, and built for quick restarts that pull you right back in.


KEY FEATURES:
- Super-tight controls and ultra-fast action — feel every dash and jump.
- Destructible elements of levels and hazards that keep you alert.
- Procedurally generated worlds for fresh routes, patterns, and experience.
- Power-ups to boost your weapon power and shield durability.
- Quick restarts — learn, retry, and progress farther with every attempt.
- Show off up close — get near your opponents and your attack turns into slick martial-arts kicks.
- Unlockable skins, tons of stats and leaderboards for the score chasers.
- Retro-inspired soundtrack to match the throwback vibe.
- Cinematic camera — an optional way to create an extra challenge.


Train your reflexes, blast through foes, and make sure that every run is better than the last one. The stage is ready for new records!
